description:
Now that she had the idea of making a ceramic cushion, Himeno`s head is completely occupied with the topic.
Flustered by the looming deadline of the contest, she has an eureka moment for making the perfect cushion while braiding Mika`s hair.
How will that ceramic cushion turn out?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: たたいてのばしてひいてたす
